value:
Sharena's personality suits this sort
of getup... My sister has a modern
sensibility. But me? Why ME?

Are you aware of a race in the World
of Awakening called taguel? They can
change to a form similar to a rabbit.

It seems my sister prepared a
costume for you as well.$k$pShe suggested that we might be less
embarrassed if you dressed up, too...
So where is it?

Do you have a spare moment? I'd like
to train if you're up for it.$k$pNo, we will not be practicing our
bunny hops.

My father is stern and very serious...
I think seeing me in this getup would
probably make him faint.

I bring regards from
$Nf.$k$pEr... Now, if you'll excuse me...

It truly is the springtime of my
youth, wouldn't you say?

Plant the seeds, and springtime
will be in full blossom.
There's still a chill in the air...

Thank you. You are as bright
as the springtime sun.

I am Alfonse, Prince of Askr. Please...
Let's talk about something besides
this costume. What do you say?

So, $Nu...$k$pI've been studying the spring festival.
The symbolism of the celebration is
fascinating...$k$pEggs represent life and birth...while
rabbits bear a large number of
offspring, so—$k$pOh, the costume? I guess I'm stuck
with it until Sharena says it's OK to
pack it up.$k$pIt's funny...maybe even scary...how
fast you can get used to something.$k$pThe longer I'm dressed like this, the
stranger the idea of taking it off
seems! The idea puts me on edge...$k$pBut I can rest assured you'll stay
friends with me no matter how I'm
attired, I suppose. No need to worry!$k$pThanks, $Nu.
It's nice to know I can count on you.
えいっ！
それっ！
うああっ！
I let my guard down...
Spring is here!
Let's celebrate!
Spring, the season of rebirth!
I'll open the way...to spring!
Spring is...fleeting...
はは
Would you like to celebrate spring with me?
Hey! What's gotten into you?
Festivals have been important to people since ancient times.
It never occurred to me that I'd be the one dressing like this.
You think this outfit looks good on me? I'm not sure how I feel about that.
At times like these, I'm envious of Sharena's carefree attitude.
Next time the spring festival rolls around, it's your turn to dress up like this. Do we have a deal?
Right.
Spring weather is quite nice.
Spring sunshine...
